summary: Two adolescent girls on an equine acrobatics team form an intimate friendship that becomes threatened by their competitive nature.
cast: Mathilda Paradeiser|Linda Molin|Isabella Lindquist|Sergej Merkusjev|Adam Lundgren|Sigmund Hovind|Kevin Caicedo Vega|Nasrin Pakkho|Maria Hedborg|Inger Lindberg|Elin Söderquist|Malin Müller|Rebecka Ahlström|Emma Liljeflod|Johanna Bergstedt|Felicia Greppe|Paulina Nilsson|Johanna Lavner
title: Apflickorna
